all: SELECT a.ID, a.AJUNUM, a.AJUFEC, a.PRODCOD, p.PRODDES, a.AJUCAN FROM ajustest AS a INNER JOIN producto AS p ON p.PRODCOD = a.PRODCOD ORDER BY a.AJUNUM DESC;

SELECT c.ID, c.CLICOD, c.CLINOM, c.VENCOD, v.VENNOM, c.CLIDOM, c.CLILOC, c.CLITEL, CASE CLIEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE CLIEST END CLIEST FROM clientes c INNER JOIN vendedor v ON v.VENCOD = c.VENCOD

SELECT c.ID, c.CLICOD, c.CLINOM, v.VENNOM, c.CLIDOM, c.CLILOC, c.CLITEL, CASE CLIEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE CLIEST END CLIEST  FROM clientes c INNER JOIN vendedor v ON v.VENCOD = c.VENCOD WHERE c.VENCOD = {search}
SELECT c.ID, c.TIPCOD, t.TIPDES,  c.CLIPRODPRE FROM cliente1 c INNER JOIN tipo t ON c.TIPCOD = t.TIPCOD WHERE CLICOD={search} ORDER BY 2;

SELECT r.ID, r.REMNUM, r.REMFEC, e.ESTDES, r.REMFACNUM, r.REMPAGNUM, r.REMDES, r.REMFACLET, (SELECT SUM(ri.REMCAN*ri.REMPRE) FROM remiitem ri WHERE ri.REMNUM = r.REMNUM)-r.REMDES TOTAL FROM remitos r INNER JOIN estados e ON e.ESTCOD = r.ESTCOD WHERE r.CLICOD = {search} ORDER BY r.ID

SELECT 'Presupuestos' TYPE, IFNULL(SUM(r1.REMCAN*r1.REMPRE),0)-r.REMDES AMOUNT FROM remitos r INNER JOIN remiitem r1 ON r1.REMNUM = r.REMNUM WHERE r.ESTCOD <> 'A' AND r.CLICOD = {search} UNION SELECT 'Conceptos', IFNULL(SUM(co.CONCANDEB-co.CONCANHAB),0) FROM concepto co WHERE co.CONCLI = {search} UNION SELECT 'Pagos', IFNULL(SUM(p2.PAGIMP),0)*-1 IMPORTE FROM pagos p  INNER JOIN pagos1 p1 ON p1.PAGNUM = p.PAGNUM INNER JOIN pagos2 p2 ON p2.PAGNUM = p.PAGNUM WHERE p.CLICOD = {search}
SELECT c.ID, c.CONNUM, c.CONFEC, c.CONDES, c.CONCLI, cl.CLINOM, c.CONCANDEB, c.CONCANHAB FROM concepto c INNER JOIN clientes cl ON c.CONCLI = cl.CLICOD ORDER BY c.CONNUM DESC;
SELECT ID, ESTCOD, ESTDES FROM estados;
SELECT ID, IVACOD, IVADES, CASE IVAEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE IVAEST END IVAEST FROM iva;
SELECT ID, NUMCOD, NUMDES, NUMVAL, NUMPV FROM numeros;

SELECT p.ID, p.PAGNUM, p.PAGFEC, p.CLICOD, c.CLINOM, (SELECT  IFNULL(SUM(PAGIMP), 0) FROM pagos2 WHERE PAGNUM <> 0 AND PAGNUM = p.PAGNUM) TOTAL FROM pagos p INNER JOIN clientes c ON p.CLICOD = c.CLICOD WHERE p.PAGNUM <> 0 ORDER BY p.ID DESC;

SELECT p.ID, r.ID REMID, p.PAGNUM, p.REMNUM, r.REMFEC, r.REMDES, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(REMCAN*REMPRE),0) FROM remiitem WHERE REMNUM=p.REMNUM)-r.REMDES REMTOT, r.ESTCOD, e.ESTDES FROM pagos1 p INNER JOIN remitos r ON r.REMNUM=p.REMNUM INNER JOIN estados e ON r.ESTCOD = e.ESTCOD WHERE p.PAGNUM={search}

SELECT r.REMNUM, r.REMFEC, r.REMDES, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(REMCAN*REMPRE),0) FROM remiitem WHERE REMNUM=r.REMNUM)-r.REMDES REMTOT FROM remitos r WHERE r.ESTCOD='S' AND r.REMNUM NOT IN (SELECT REMNUM FROM PAGOS1) AND r.REMNUM <> 0 AND r.CLICOD={search};
SELECT ID, PAGNUM, PAGSEC, PAGTIP, PAGIMP, PAGCHENUM, PAGCHEBAN FROM pagos2 WHERE PAGNUM={search};
SELECT ID, IVAFEC, IVAPOR FROM porciva;

SELECT p.ID, p.PRODCOD, p.PRODDES, p.TIPCOD, t.TIPDES, p.SUBTIPCOD, t1.SUBTIPDES, p.PRODSTO, p.PRODPRE, CASE p.PRODEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE p.PRODEST END PRODEST FROM producto p INNER JOIN tipo t ON p.TIPCOD = t.TIPCOD LEFT JOIN tipo1 t1 ON p.SUBTIPCOD = t1.SUBTIPCOD;

SELECT p.ID, p.PRODCOD, p.PRODDES, p.TIPCOD, t.TIPDES, p.SUBTIPCOD, t1.SUBTIPDES, p.PRODPRE FROM producto p INNER JOIN tipo t ON p.TIPCOD = t.TIPCOD LEFT JOIN tipo1 t1 ON p.SUBTIPCOD = t1.SUBTIPCOD WHERE p.PRODEST='A';
SELECT ID, AJUNUM, AJUFEC, AJUCAN, AJUOBS FROM ajustest WHERE PRODCOD = {search};
SELECT PROCOD, PRONOM FROM provinci;

SELECT r.ID, r.REMNUM, r.REMFEC, r.REMDES, e.ESTDES, r.VENCOD, v.VENNOM, r.CLICOD, c.CLINOM, COUNT(i.REMCAN) REMQTY, IFNULL(SUM(i.REMPRE * i.REMCAN),0) REMTOT FROM remitos r LEFT OUTER JOIN remiitem i ON i.REMNUM = r.REMNUM INNER JOIN estados e ON r.ESTCOD = e.ESTCOD INNER JOIN vendedor v ON r.VENCOD = v.VENCOD INNER JOIN clientes c ON r.CLICOD = c.CLICOD WHERE r.REMNUM <> 0 GROUP BY r.ID ORDER BY r.REMNUM DESC;
SELECT r.ID, r.REMNUM, p.PRODCOD, p.PRODDES, r.REMCAN, r.REMPRE FROM remiitem r INNER JOIN producto p ON p.PRODCOD = r.PRODCOD WHERE r.REMNUM = {search}

SELECT r.CLICOD, c.CLINOM, r.VENCOD, v.VENNOM, c.CLILOC, r.REMNUM, r.REMFEC, r.REMFACNUM, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(ri.REMCAN*ri.REMPRE) FROM remiitem ri WHERE ri.REMNUM = r.REMNUM),0)-r.REMDES TOTAL, DATEDIFF(NOW(), r.REMFEC) DAYS FROM remitos r INNER JOIN clientes c ON c.CLICOD = r.CLICOD INNER JOIN vendedor v ON v.VENCOD = r.VENCOD WHERE r.REMNUM <> 0 AND r.ESTCOD = 'S' ORDER BY DAYS DESC, r.VENCOD ASC, r.CLICOD ASC;
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, TIPDES, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tipo1 WHERE tipo1.TIPCOD = t.TIPCOD) SUBTIPOS, CASE TIPEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE TIPEST END TIPEST FROM tipo t
update-price: UPDATE producto SET PRODPRE={PRODPRE} WHERE PRODEST='A' AND TIPCOD='{TIPCOD}';

all: SELECT ID, TIPCOD, TIPDES FROM tipo WHERE TIPEST='A'
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, SUBTIPCOD, SUBTIPDES, CASE SUBTIPEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE SUBTIPEST END SUBTIPEST FROM tipo1 WHERE TIPCOD = '{search}'
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, SUBTIPCOD, SUBTIPDES, CASE SUBTIPEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE SUBTIPEST END SUBTIPEST FROM tipo1
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, SUBTIPCOD, SUBTIPDES FROM tipo1 WHERE SUBTIPEST='A'
SELECT ID, TRACOD, TRANOM, TRADOM, TRALOC, TRATEL, CASE TRAEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE TRAEST END TRAEST FROM transpor
SELECT ID, TRACOD, TRANOM, TRADOM, TRALOC, TRATEL FROM transpor WHERE TRAEST='A'
SELECT ID, VENCOD, VENNOM, VENDOM, VENLOC, VENTEL, CASE VENEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE VENEST END VENEST FROM vendedor
SELECT ID, VENCOD, VENNOM, VENDOM, VENLOC, VENTEL FROM vendedor WHERE VENEST='A'
SELECT v.ID, CONCAT(v.TIPCOD, ' - ', t.TIPDES) TIPDES, v.VENCOM FROM vendedo2 v INNER JOIN tipo t ON t.TIPCOD = v.TIPCOD WHERE VENCOD = {search};
